attributes.action: Abolish the East of England Regional Assembly
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
EERA is a unelected, undemocratic quango pretending to be the “regional government” of the geographically absurd “East of England Region”. This comprises East Anglia (Norfolk, Suffolk, Cambridgeshire and Essex) plus two adjacent Home Counties (Hertfordshire and Bedfordshire). It makes no sense from any historical or current perspective and has no resonance with the people who live there. 

The Government promised a referendum on these “English Regional” assemblies until voters rejected the “North East” assembly. But the EERA has continued to work without such a mandate.

The EERA's Plans to build over 500,000 new houses and expand Luton and Stansted Airports would destroy much of the countryside and Green Belt. They appear to have no regard for new infrastructure needed (transport, hospitals and schools), the environmental damage or the views of existing residents. 

EERA should be abolished immediately.
